summary: Completed testing of NativiWeb Studio MVP - Migration from React/Yarn/MongoDB to Next.js/npm/Supabase verified. All backend APIs working, frontend pages loading correctly.
passed_tests: Backend API health check: GET /api/health returns healthy status

Backend API features: GET /api/features returns 12 native features
Auth validation: Login with invalid credentials returns 401
Auth validation: Register with missing fields returns 422
API Keys endpoint requires user_id parameter
Landing page loads with navigation (Login, Get Started buttons)
Login page displays with email/password fields and GitHub OAuth button
Register page displays with name, email, password, confirm password fields
Next.js 14.2.21 is running (verified via next.config.js and .next folder)
npm is used (package-lock.json exists, no yarn.lock)
context_for_next_testing_agent: NativiWeb Studio MVP is fully functional. Backend uses FastAPI with Supabase integration. Frontend uses Next.js 14 with TypeScript. All auth flows use Supabase Auth. Build process is MOCKED (generates fake artifacts, not real compilation). GitHub OAuth requires Supabase dashboard configuration.
